sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container fluid class="pa-8">
    <v-row align="center">
      <v-col cols="12">
        <v-select  
          item-text="nome"
          item-value="id"
          :items="usuarios"
          prepend-icon="mdi-pencil"
          @click:prepend="clearSearch"
          append-outer-icon="mdi-plus"
          @click:append-outer="submit"
          menu-props="auto"
          label="Selecione o usuÃ¡rio ou clique no + para cadastrar"
        ></v-select>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>

  import Usuario from  '@/services/usuarios'

  export default {

    usuarios: [],
    
    data () {
      return {
        usuarios: []
      }     
    },

    mounted(){
      Usuario.getAll().then(resposta => {
        console.log(resposta.data)
        this.usuarios = resposta.data
      })
    },

    methods:{
      submit(){
        console.log(this.clearSearch)
      },
      clearSearch(){
        console.log(this.clearSearch)
      }
    }

  }
</script>
